tool_description: Verifies building height compliance against zoning restrictions, including measurement methodology and exceptions for architectural features.

max_height_limit.description: Zoning maximum height limit in feet

error_messages: Invalid height measurements: Building height and height limit must be positive numbers.
Unknown measurement method: Use standard methods like 'average_grade', 'highest_point', or 'curb_level'.
Measurement inconsistency: Building height measurement appears inconsistent with stated methodology.
usage: Input measured building height, zoning height limits, and measurement methodology to verify height compliance. Critical for identifying illegal additions or construction.

height_compliant.description: Whether building height meets zoning requirements

height_variance.description: Difference between actual and maximum height
